name: The Queen's Ambition
description:
The Crystal of Power. Something so powerful that it has thrust the continent of Volnia into constant war. Deciding that the war needed to stop, the Queen's gathered and opted to break the crystal into pieces and end the endless war. 

However, after receiving intel that the other two had gotten their hands on additional fragments, Liliana decides to create minions to serve her purpose and gather all the fragments of the Crystal for herself. 

Features:

- Expendable Minions: If a minion dies, it cannot be revived. If your team is wiped out, don't worry, you will retrieve their essences and make more. 

- Class System: Pick unique classes for your minions. When they are reborn they'll retain the skills they have learned. 

- Gather Fragments and Grow: As Liliana collects more fragments, her power will increase (and so will she). Her capabilities will improve and recreating minions will only get easier.

- New Game +: When you are defeated you will start a new game, but your items and progress is saved and you'll get some goodies when you re-enter the game.

Made for the 2022 Gain Jam. 

v1.3 Changelog:

- Enemies have been nerfed significantly. Clearing the dungeons shouldn't be as tedious now. 

- Minions will now look how based on their chosen class.

- Steal Item was changed to boost the steal rate. You can now also choose the item to steal.

- Purify is now 100% chance to cleanse status ailments, Purify 2 heals some HP.

- Mana costs added to some moves.

- Some moves altered to deal less damage.

- Chakra restores less HP and MP now. 

- Rosa shouldn't glitch out and prevent the player from progressing.

- Image issues where some images wouldn't show up properly.

- Spelling corrections in some text blocks.

- Favour is generated differently now and will accumulate much faster as you progress and collect fragments.
